duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide development system administration and R&D network administration for Software and Test R&D teams.
Creation and maintenance of Azure DevOps pipelines used in the development of medical device software.
Documentation of designs, and collaboration with cross functional teams.
Coordinate closely with developers and IT representatives to ensure proper design and deployment of engineering network.
Manage code signing certificates and aid in the signing of compiled resultants.
Manage vSphere VM infrastructure used for software development.
Design and implement portions of software and builds for new devices or applications.
Provide support with technical expertise across different medical products for new software features or functions.
Identify new methodologies, processes, or tools associated with development pipelining.
Drive continuous improvement activities by identifying and appropriately escalating process and product quality gaps.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, IT Administration, Engineering discipline or equivalent (Master's preferred)
